content: #21694 introduces a predicate RkFin (M : Matroid α) (X : Set α) : Prop, which states that every basis in M for the set X is finite, along with simple API (the property is preserved by taking subsets, finite unions, matroid closure, etc). This is necessary to develop the proper API for Nat and ENat-valued rank functions. It is a 200-line leaf file.
